about_the_game:
You are an experimental brain ball that uses speed, agility and smarts to complete your mission…..all while being chased by a horde of hungry zombies. Escape the dungeon by using its crazy experimental gadgets or test your speed on the maze as you attempt to unlock the gate and leave before it closes.





Gameplay:
Players roll around and jump throughout the level and must avoid the zombies following them. With each swipe the zombie makes, a piece of the player's brain falls off until there is nothing left. Throughout the game players can use various potions and attain pickups to enhance their abilities to accomplish the challenges, including an invisibility potion which allows players to slip passed patrolling zombies.

Features:


Choose your gameplay mode:
Challenge yourself with different game modes including escape the dungeon and maze challenge. In Dungeon Escape, players unlock the various levers to unlock the door and then must escape before the door closes. Maze allows players to navigate their own path while avoiding the horde of patrolling zombies.

Use quirky and ridiculous gadgets:
The levels are filled with intractable objects which can give the player abilities like invisibility and restore health as well as destructible objects they can use to combat the zombies.

Easy to learn controls:
WSAD and jump for keyboard users or joystick movement for those who have a game controller. These controls are consistent throughout the game and are easy to pick up for new players.

Choose your own brain skin:
Choose between Disco, Circuitry and Slime brain cosmetics to play the game in style!
